prod_short_desc: Send Lance speeding after the Stone monsters!
prod_long_desc:
Race ahead of the rest of the knights with the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Battle Suit Lance play set, featuring a buildable battle suit with rolling feet, posable limbs, minifigure cockpit, super-sized lance, giant fist and a Combo NEXO Power shield. Includes five scannable shields for NEXO Powers that provide unique battle skills in the digital game and a new-for-spring-2017 Lance minifigure.
Includes a new-for-spring-2017 Lance minifigure.
Features a buildable battle suit with highly posable limbs, wheeled feet, giant fist and a minifigure cockpit.
Speed the knight along with the battle suit’s wheels!
Also includes a super-sized buildable lance.
Accessory elements include a Combo NEXO Power shield and five scannable NEXO Powers.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents' permission.
Scan shields for eachof the five NEXO Powers (Diamond Spear, Silver Pegasus, Standing Ovation, WhirlWind and Dynamighty) and create your own combinations to power up and defeat the Stone monsters in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game.
Combine with vehicles in other LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets to enhance the battle suit with futuristic functions!
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ characters on Cartoon Network.
Stands over 3” tall.
